comments:
Build ID: 3.2.1

Steps To Reproduce:
Run test plan on wiki.
Runtime tests work ok.
First launch for debug gives single dialog of "Error"
with no other information.


More information:


.log gives SWT error which is caused by:

I fixed this error in HEAD version, but forgot to commit to 1.1.  Now I have committed to 1.1.
Works for me now. thanks Clement!
